stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Building a new website can take a long time often longer than expected.

That doesn't mean you have to wait to market your business. A quality coming soon holding page can allow you to market your business and start to capture sales leads from day one.

This service includes the following:

  • HTML/CSS for landing page customized to colours of your brand
  • logo
  • tagline
  • email capture form powered by CampaignMonitor.com
  • up to 5 social media icons
  • site responsive for mobile devices

The end result is a professional design you can use to promote your business to the world and start building your brand and validating your business.

What can I expect?

  • Setup CampaignMonitor.com account and email capture form
  • Setup logo on the page and customize the background + colours
  • Setup on clients server and test on mobile devices
title: Custom "Coming Soon" Landing Page Setup
